title: Will Dragon Knight Mordekaiser ever have a chance to come back for purchase?
body:
I've been trying forever now to get lucky with hextech/mystery gift to unlock the last skin for my favorite champion. But I just end up wasting more money on things I don't want to try to rng gamble on this skin. (I get this is the idea behind it, but still)

Is their any chance Riot will bring back Dragon Knight Morde? Even for an hour lol? Please spare my wallet riot!

http://loldb.gameguyz.com/images/skins_big_skin_fid_path/mordekaiser-dragon-knight.jpg

replies.body:
I got it with the personal shop this time around.
http://65.media.tumblr.com/e0dc18bad2a97c8ea4a23478a4018b5c/tumblr_inline_mn7rghYv0n1qz4rgp.gif

:p
Funny enough I got lorde mordekaiser, which finished up my entire collection except for that damn dragon knight that I can't ever find! xD
I made sure to pick up that skin for 260RP during the Christmas sales. The Christmas sale event puts up a LOT of legendary skins, including DK Morde. You would have to wait several months...

Legacy skins do become available during certain types of events.
Or you could simply dump all your cash on mystery gifts XD

Legacy skins are usually made available for purchase around Christmas over the course of a few days.

Pretty sure you will be able to score it at that time.
I just got him in the "your shop" thing. He's a legacy skin, he will only be available at random through special events. Just gotta keep your fingers crossed.

Funny enough, I got the skin two days ago from my personal skin shop thing going on.  Hopefully they do make it accessible by some means. Would look great on a newer model, seems a bit too faded color wise in game.
